version_description:
New in 3.5.2

Now allowing user to answer calls or respond to IMs from lockscreen
Account based TLS Certificate Verification fix
Stability and performance improvements

New in 3.5.2

Now allowing user to answer calls or respond to IMs from lockscreen
Account based TLS Certificate Verification fix
Stability and performance improvements

New in 3.6.1

New network quality indicator
Improved support for SIP P-Asserted Identity 
Support for XMPP VCard "preferred" property

Stability and performance improvements.

New in 3.6.1

New network quality indicator
Improved support for SIP P-Asserted Identity 
Support for XMPP VCard "preferred" property

Stability and performance improvements.

New in 3.6.2

Stability improvements when switching data networks

New in 3.6.2

Stability improvements when switching data networks

New in 3.6.3

H.264 video improvements
Added announcement mechanism for important service and product notices when available.
Stability and performance improvements.

New in 3.6.3

H.264 video improvements
Added announcement mechanism for important service and product notices when available.
Stability and performance improvements.

Bria iPhone Edition 3.6.4

Initial IPv6 support - see Account Advanced
Support for TLS 1.2
Improved video support for Asterisk

Bria iPhone Edition 3.6.4

Initial IPv6 support - see Account Advanced
Support for TLS 1.2
Improved video support for Asterisk

New in 3.6.5

Bluetooth mute fix

New in 3.6.5

Bluetooth mute fix

Support for hyperlink previews in Instant Messages
Back to Call UI improvement
One tap voicemail calling
Improved IPv6 support
Updated icons
Stability and performance improvements

Support for hyperlink previews in Instant Messages
Back to Call UI improvement
One tap voicemail calling
Improved IPv6 support
Updated icons
Stability and performance improvements

NOTE:  Due to a bug in iOS 10, you may need to restart your device to get notifications to work properly.  Press and hold both the Sleep/Wake and Home buttons for at least ten seconds, until you see the Apple logo.

Bluetooth audio fix 
Fix for slow DNS resolution issue
Support for hyperlink previews in Instant Messages
Back to Call UI improvement
One tap voicemail calling
Improved IPv6 support
Updated icons
Stability and performance improvements

NOTE:  Due to a bug in iOS 10, you may need to restart your device to get notifications to work properly.  Press and hold both the Sleep/Wake and Home buttons for at least ten seconds, until you see the Apple logo.

Bluetooth audio fix 
Fix for slow DNS resolution issue
Support for hyperlink previews in Instant Messages
Back to Call UI improvement
One tap voicemail calling
Improved IPv6 support
Updated icons
Stability and performance improvements

Bria iPhone Edition 3.8.1.36276.36277

CallKit native call integration now supported  
720p support for H.264 video calls
Video thumbnail preview control 
IPv6 support enhancements

CounterPath's iOS applications can be used with CarPlay compatible vehicles, but only if the user is using an audio source from the iOS device.  If the user is playing audio directly from the vehicle, the audio will be muted while the CounterPath application is running in a "background" state.

Bria iPhone Edition 3.8.1.36276.36277

CallKit native call integration now supported  
720p support for H.264 video calls
Video thumbnail preview control 
IPv6 support enhancements

CounterPath's iOS applications can be used with CarPlay compatible vehicles, but only if the user is using an audio source from the iOS device.  If the user is playing audio directly from the vehicle, the audio will be muted while the CounterPath application is running in a "background" state.

Bria iPhone Edition 3.8.2

• Group chat enhancements, including multi-selection of participants
• Enhancements to user interface for improved look and feel
• Use Siri to launch Bria and make audio or video calls

Bria iPhone Edition 3.8.2

• Group chat enhancements, including multi-selection of participants
• Enhancements to user interface for improved look and feel
• Use Siri to launch Bria and make audio or video calls

Bria iPhone Edition 3.9.1

·         Users can now share recorded calls directly from within Bria using AirDrop, Messages, email or iTunes. Access recorded calls in Call Log, tap on the Information Icon and select “Share Recording”.
·         Need help with sending an instant message? Just ask Siri. Improved Siri support offers a convenient option to help send your message to contacts.
·         Improved contacts integration with greater synchronization between Bria and native phone contacts.

Bria iPhone Edition 3.9.1

·         Users can now share recorded calls directly from within Bria using AirDrop, Messages, email or iTunes. Access recorded calls in Call Log, tap on the Information Icon and select “Share Recording”.
·         Need help with sending an instant message? Just ask Siri. Improved Siri support offers a convenient option to help send your message to contacts.
·         Improved contacts integration with greater synchronization between Bria and native phone contacts.

Bria 3.9.2
   Improved support for larger Address Books
   Stability and performance improvements

Bria 3.9.2
   Improved support for larger Address Books
   Stability and performance improvements

Bria iPhone Edition 3.9.3

Improved support for running Bria in the background on iOS 10.3.  See Preferences > Background Support.    Turn on Enhanced mode to enable improved backgrounding on iOS 10.3+.  This may consume more battery.
